Banklọ akụ ụwa bụ ụlọ ọrụ ego mba ụwa nke na-enye mbinye ego na onyinye nye gọọmentị nke mba ndị dị ala na nke etiti maka ebumnuche ịchụso ọrụ ego.  Banklọ akụ ụwa bụ aha mkpokọta maka International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) na International Development Association (IDA), abụọ n'ime otu mba ụwa ise nke otu World Bank Group nwe.  Emebere ya na International Monetary Fund na 1944 Bretton Woods Conference.  Mgbe ọ malitere ngwa ngwa, mbinye ego mbụ ya bụ France na 1947

N'afọ 1970, ọ lekwasịrị anya na mbinye ego maka mba ụwa na-emepe emepe, na-apụ na ọrụ ahụ na 1980s.  N'ime afọ 30 gara aga, ọ gụnyere NGO na otu gburugburu ebe obibi na Pọtụfoliyo mbinye ego ya.  Atụmatụ mbinye ego ya bụ ebumnuche mmepe nke Millennium yana nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.
